projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
Currently some events are sending more data than needed. We need to define what needs to be sent for each of the different events. Below is a list of data that is being sent:
id
mid
rdu
type
aguid
event
seq
ver
deploytype
sid
ts
data

Need to document when we should be sending all this information and when some information can be omitted
fields.summary: TiAPI: Analytic Events: Review and define what information should be sent for each event

comments.body: QE needs this to make sure we are testing correctly, and as jumping off point for discussions around improvements started by Gabe and Ingo
[~nle] [~jwhaley] we will start this in STREAM-450
